item.title: Colombia Provides Key Backdrop for Season 2 of ‘The Night Manager’
item.description: It’s been some eight years since the BBC adaptation of John le Carré’s “The Night Manager” took the world by storm, racking up awards on both sides of the pond. The spy thriller, starring Tom Hiddlest
